lexUnit.name: disaster.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a sudden accident or natural catastrophe that causes great damage or loss of life or an event...leading to ruin or failure.

sentence.text: THE worst drought in Britain for 200 years could spell disaster for wildlife in some parts of the country , but locally , there is no cause for alarm -- yet .

We are in the presence of a disaster of the first magnitude .
The poll tax has been a social , political and economic disaster of historic proportions .

It is astonishing that health ministersn now grappling with the financial disasters of the NHS internal market further down the line , should be so complacent in the early stages of their much-vaunted mixed economy of care .
